thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: Margaret Coffey
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by Margaret Coffey

author: Margaret Coffey
title: Margaret Coffey
text:
On the two occasions I have shopped on-line with McElhinneys I have been bowled over by the experience. Everything is made so easy - the ordering, the delivery, the return if necessary, and the customer service.
The quantity of stock in the women's section is amazing. I would have no reservations in recommended this company to all. Thank you McElhinneys
